    • Constructor Detail

      • Battle

        public Battle(Trainer player1,
              Trainer player2)
        Constructor of Battle. Sets each Trainer variable and loads the type chart.
        Parameters:
        player1 - Trainer to be considered as "Player 1"
        player2 - Trainer to be considered as "Player 2"

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeChart

        public double[][] getTypeChart()
        Returns the type chart.
        Returns:
        the type chart.

      • loadTypeChart

        public void loadTypeChart()
        Loads the type chart from a file to the typeChart variable.

      • whoAttacksFirst

        public void whoAttacksFirst()
        Calculates which of the two pokemons currently in battle (the party leaders of each trainer) should attack first and sets the firstToAttack attribute in the BattleVariables. The pokemon that attacks first is the one with the greater Speed stat. If these stats are equal, the pokemon to attack first is chosen at random.

      • attackPokemon

        public int attackPokemon(Pokemon attacker,
                         Pokemon defender,
                         int movIndex,
                         Trainer who)
        Sets the BattleVariables depending on if the move hits, is critical or not, its effectiveness on the foe and the StatStages it may apply to both the attacking and defending pokemon. Besides setting this information to the BattleVariables, the function actually applies the eventual StatStages to each pokemon and the calculated damage to the defending pokemon.
        Parameters:
        attacker - the pokemon that is attacking
        defender - the pokemon that will be attacked
        movIndex - the index of the move that the attacking pokemon is going to use
        who - the Trainer of the attacking pokemon
        Returns:
        the damage the defending pokemon will receive

      • switchPokemon

        public void switchPokemon(int index,
                          Trainer who)
        Swaps the pokemon at the given index with the one at the first position of the party (the party leader). It also resets each pokemons StatStages, so that changes to stats are only kept meanwhile the pokemon are in battle.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Pokemon to be swapped in to battle
        who - the Trainer that is switching pokemons

      • setMove

        public void setMove(int moveIndex,
                    Trainer who)
        Sets the corresponding moveIndex attribute in the BattleVariables to the one passed as a parameter according to the given trainer.
        Parameters:
        moveIndex - index of the move
        who - Trainer whose move index will bet set.

      • setStages

        public void setStages(StatStages self,
                      StatStages enemy,
                      Trainer who)
        Sets both player's stages attribute in the BattleVariables according to the given Trainer. So if the 'who' parameter is Player 1 then the player1Stages will be 'self'. On the other hand, if 'who' is Player 2 then 'self' will be set to the Player2Stages.
        Parameters:
        self - the self StatStages of a move
        enemy - the enemy StatStages of a move
        who - Trainer who used the move

      • applyStages

        public void applyStages(Move chosenMove,
                        Pokemon attacker,
                        Pokemon defender)
        Applies the chosenMove's StatStages to both the attacking pokemon, meaning it will receive the SelfStatStages, and the defending pokemon, that will receive the EnemyStatStages. If the chosenMove's StatStages are all zero there is no need to apply them.
        Parameters:
        chosenMove - the move used by the attacking pokemon
        attacker - the pokemon that is attacking
        defender - the pokemon that will be attacked

      • setSwitch

        public void setSwitch(boolean switched,
                      Trainer who)
        Sets the Switch attributes in the BattleVariables according to if the given Trainer has switched pokemons.
        Parameters:
        switched - boolean that indicates if a Trainer has switched pokemons
        who - the Trainer that may or may not have switched pokemons

      • setMoveHit

        public boolean setMoveHit(boolean moveHit,
                          Trainer who)
        Sets the Hits attributes in the BattleVariables according to if the given Trainer's pokemon has successfully hit the foe.
        Parameters:
        moveHit - boolean that indicates if the Trainer's pokemon has succesfully hit the foe.
        who - the Trainer whose pokemon is attacking.
        Returns:
        true if the move hits, false if the move fails to hit

      • setCritical

        public void setCritical(boolean critical,
                        Trainer who)
        Sets the Critical attributes in the BattleVariables according to if the given Trainer's pokemon critically struck the foe.
        Parameters:
        critical - boolean that indicates if the Trainer's pokemon has critically struck the foe.
        who - the Trainer whose pokemon is attacking.

      • setEffectiveness

        public void setEffectiveness(Move move,
                             Pokemon target,
                             Trainer who)
        Sets the Effectiveness attributes in the BattleVariables according to the effectiveness of the move used by the given Trainer's pokemon on the foe. The possible values of these attributes and their meaning are the following: 0 does not affect 1 not very effective 2 normal effectiveness 3 super effective
        Parameters:
        move - the move used by the given Trainer's pokemon
        target - the defending pokemon
        who - the Trainer whose pokemon is attacking

      • isCritical

        public boolean isCritical(Move move)
        Based on the move's chance to be critical returns if the move will critically strike or not.
        Parameters:
        move - the move to test if it will critically strike
        Returns:
        true if the move is critical, false otherwise

      • moveHits

        public boolean moveHits(Pokemon attacker,
                        Pokemon defender,
                        Move chosenMove)
        Calculates if the move is going to hit or not based on the move's accuracy, the attacking pokemon's accuracy modifier and the defending pokemon's evasion modifier.
        Parameters:
        attacker - the pokemon that is attacking
        defender - the pokemon that is defending
        chosenMove - the attacking pokemon's chosen move
        Returns:
        true if the move hits, false otherwise

      • calculateModifier

        public double calculateModifier(Pokemon attacker,
                                Pokemon defender,
                                Move chosenMove,
                                boolean critical)
        Calculates and returns the modifier that will be further used to calculate the damage that the defending pokemon will take. This modifier takes into account the effectiveness of the move on the defender, a small random factor that will range from 0.85 to 1.0 and also if the move is STAB and/or critical.
        Parameters:
        attacker - the pokemon that is attacking
        defender - the pokemon that will be attacked
        chosenMove - the move used by the attacker
        critical - true if the move is critical and false otherwise
        Returns:
        the calculated modifier

      • calculateDamage

        public double calculateDamage(Pokemon attacker,
                              Pokemon defender,
                              Move chosenMove,
                              double modifier,
                              boolean critical)
        Calculates and returns the damage caused by the attacking pokemon's move on the defender. The damage is calculated through a formula that takes into account the attackers level, the move's power, the attacker's Attack/Special Attack and the defender's Defense/Special Defense stats depending if the move is physical or special respectively.
        Parameters:
        attacker - the pokemon that is attacking
        defender - the pokemon that will be attacked
        chosenMove - the move used by the attacker
        modifier - the modifier to use in the damage formula
        critical - true if the move is critical, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the damage the defending pokemon will receive

      • isSTAB

        public boolean isSTAB(Move move,
                      Pokemon self)
        Returns true if the given move is STAB and false otherwise. A move is considered STAB (Same Type Attack Bonus) if its type is the same as one of the types of the pokemon that used it. ~
        Parameters:
        move - the move to test
        self - the pokemon that used the move
        Returns:
        true if the move is STAB, returns false otherwise

      • modifierAgainst

        public double modifierAgainst(Move move,
                              Pokemon target)
        Calculates and returns the modifier of a move against a target pokemon, based on the move's type and the pokemon's type(s).
        Parameters:
        move - move to test
        target - the target pokemon
        Returns:
        the modifier of a move against a target pokemon

        public Trainer getPlayer1()
